Abstrak:
Many  marketers  within  the  business  community  have  long  considered  branding  to  be  a 
method  that  can  effectively  reduce  or  eliminate  competition  for  a  product  and  can  draw  in 
customers  in  a  similar fashion  to  the  way  a  magnet  attracts  metal.  Brand  identity  is  all  about influencing the public’s thoughts and feelings toward an intended perception (Rampersad, 2008). 
Branding applied originally to products but now has evolved to include branding of services, and 
largely  through  the  advent  of  the  Internet,  has  transformed  to  include  the  branding  of  the 
personal  services  individuals  can  provide  to  employers  through  self-packaging  and  promotional 
techniques that can allow individuals to shape the public’s digital perception of them. This article 
explores what personal branding is, the importance of personal branding, the issues one should be 
mindful of when promoting a digital personal brand, and how one goes about personal branding
